title: Ekdal: 'Quarantine was hard'
description: Sampdoria midfielder Albin Ekdal has spent a month in quarantine after testing positive for coronavirus and the Sweden international admitted âit was very hardâ.
content:
Sampdoria midfielder Albin Ekdal has spent a month in quarantine after testing positive for coronavirus and the Sweden international admitted ‘it was very hard’.
The Blucerchiati were one of the teams hardest-hit by the pandemic last month and the 30-year-ol… [+1618 chars]
